name: Lost In The Dark - Playtest
description:
Lost In The Dark is a 2D adventure platformer where you play as a boy and his disonnected shadow trying to reconnect. This game is meant to be a move forward and think about what you have to do next by observing whats new within the level and how the objects in the environment are interacting with each other. Something that looks different or is changing how the environment is working means you probably can interact with it to affect your player or shadow

Player Information and Main Control Scheme.

Some good key information

The Journal can help you at times within the levels and you should use it to familiarize your self with the controls and mechanics of the game.

This game feels alot better by downloading the game and playing it using the exe instead of the WebGL and performance is very limited on the WebGL build currently.

The end of levels are indicated by lights that look like this, To complete the level stand underneath the light that looks like this. When both characters are underneath this light, you can move to the next level.
